{"id":982692835,"question_id":3,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"11 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1688081665,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"6 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/982692835/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"43.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int lengthOfLongestSubstring(String s) {\n        int left = 0;\n        int right = 0;\n        int max = 0;\n        HashMap<Character, Integer> map = new HashMap<Character, Integer>();\n        while(right < s.length()) {\n            left = Math.max(left, map.get(s.charAt(right)) == null ? 0 : map.get(s.charAt(right)) + 1);\n            // System.out.println(\"left: \" + left + \"; right: \" + right + \"; \" + s.charAt(right));\n            max = Math.max(max, right - left + 1);\n            map.put(s.charAt(right), right);\n            right++;\n        }\n        return max;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
